hero.title: We Transform
hero.subtitle: Specialists in 3D modeling and industrial projects. We use the best tools in the market to deliver precise and innovative solutions.

about.title: Engineering with
about.description1: V-eng specializes in industrial projects and 3D modeling. With years of market experience, we offer high-quality technical solutions for industries across various sectors.
about.description2: Our team of engineers and designers is ready to transform your ideas into viable projects, using the most advanced tools in the market such as SolidWorks, AutoCAD, and SketchUp.

precision.title: Precision
precision.description: Every detail matters. Our projects are developed with technical rigor and attention to the smallest details.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use the best practices and software in the market to ensure exceptional results.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: We work side by side with our clients, understanding their needs and exceeding expectations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly seek new solutions and technologies to optimize our projects.

services.title: Complete Solutions in
services.subtitle: We offer a complete range of engineering services to meet all your industrial project needs.

3dModeling.title: 3D Modeling
3dModeling.description: Creation of precise three-dimensional models for visualization and manufacturing of industrial parts and equipment.

technicalProjects.title: Technical Projects
technicalProjects.description: Development of complete technical projects with detailing and specifications for execution.

industrialProjects.title: Industrial Projects
industrialProjects.description: Complete solutions for industrial facilities, factory layouts and process optimization.

mechanicalEngineering.title: Mechanical Engineering
mechanicalEngineering.description: Projects for machines, equipment and mechanical systems for various industry sectors.

nr35Inspection.title: NR-35 Inspection
nr35Inspection.description: Complete technical inspection for work at height in accordance with regulatory standard NR-35.

nr12Inspection.title: NR-12 Inspection
nr12Inspection.description: Safety inspection of machines and equipment in accordance with regulatory standard NR-12.

nr35Compliance.title: NR-35 Compliance
nr35Compliance.description: Adaptation of structures and systems for compliance with work at height standards.

technicalDocumentation.title: Technical Documentation
technicalDocumentation.description: Preparation of all technical documentation necessary for regularization and compliance.

detailing.title: Detailing
detailing.description: Complete detailing of parts and assemblies for industrial manufacturing and assembly.

consulting.title: Consulting
consulting.description: Specialized technical advisory for optimization of projects and industrial processes.

projects.title: Our
projects.subtitle: Discover some of the projects we have developed for our clients.

conveyorSystem.title: Lifeline for Work at Height
conveyorSystem.shortDescription: Anchoring system for height services in compliance with NR-35.
conveyorSystem.description: Complete lifeline system project for anchoring workers in height services. Developed in compliance with NR-35, ensuring safety and protection against falls on elevated structures.

equipmentModeling.title: Stairway with Protection and Gate
equipmentModeling.shortDescription: Stairway with protection system and security gate for access control.
equipmentModeling.description: Complete stairway project with protection system and security gate for access control. Developed to prevent unauthorized access to elevated areas, ensuring safety and compliance with industrial safety standards.

industrialPlant.title: Industrial Plant - Chemical Processing
industrialPlant.shortDescription: Complete 3D modeling of industrial plant with access structures and safety systems.
industrialPlant.description: Complete isometric 3D modeling of industrial plant with tanks, elevated platforms and access structures. Detailed project including complete stairway structure, platforms with guardrails and safety systems necessary for safe operation at height.

metalStructure.title: Multi-Level Stairway with Guardrail
metalStructure.shortDescription: Metal structure stairway with guardrail on three levels and perimeter protection.
metalStructure.description: Complete metal structure stairway project with guardrail on three levels and perimeter protection system (end-to-end guardrail) at the top of the warehouse. Developed to ensure safety and secure access at different heights of the structure.

fillingMachine.title: Cyclone Particle Separator
fillingMachine.shortDescription: Industrial cyclone for efficient separation of solid particles from gas streams.
fillingMachine.description: Complete industrial cyclone particle separator (dust cyclone) project. Equipment developed for efficient separation of solid particles from gas streams, essential in exhaust systems and industrial pollution control.

pharmaceuticalLayout.title: Protection Structure for Tanks
pharmaceuticalLayout.shortDescription: Metal protection and access structure for industrial tanks.
pharmaceuticalLayout.description: Complete metal protection and access structure project for industrial tanks. Developed to surround and protect storage tanks, providing safety, facilitated maintenance and access control to operation areas.

aerospacePrototype.title: Aerospace Component Prototype
aerospacePrototype.description: Modeling and rendering of component for aerospace industry.

contact.title: Let's Talk About
contact.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your engineering needs. Our team is ready to help transform your ideas into reality.

toast.emailNotSentDescription: Could not send email. Check your connection and try again.

footer.description: Transforming ideas into engineering projects with excellence and innovation.
